column1: #Text=I hate to break bad news but most of the complainers about housing prices in Vancouver will not be able to afford a house even IF Foreign buyers were eliminated and prices dropped 30%.
#Text=You'll still be outbid by some wealthy Easterner whose kids are grown up so they sell the house in TO and retire to BC, thus driving up prices.
#Text=And you'll still notice a lot of Chinese Canadian homeowners who worked hard instead of complaining.Accept your lot in life and buy a crackhouse in the Downtown Eastside and gentrify it.
#Text=That's how people have been making money in Real Estate since Cities had ghettos.
